articles.author: Hans von der Burchard
articles.title: G7 gives Iran sharp warning not to send ballistic missiles to Russia - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: ‘We are prepared to respond in a swift and coordinated manner’ if Tehran sends missiles to Moscow, G7 ministers say.
articles.content: "We call on Iran not to do so, as it would represent a substantive material escalation in its support for Russias war in Ukraine," the G7 text reads. If Tehran were to do so, "we are prepared to resp… [+556 chars]
